ExampleDesign.Name: MPSoC_ext_platform_part
ExampleDesign.Description:
An extensible platform is the foundation of the Vitis software acceleration flow. This platform enables Vitis to create PL kernels. It gives the kernels access to PS (MPSoC), an interrupt controller and clocking resources.
Extensible interfaces are marked with PFM properties and the platform is exported to Vitis using write_hw_platform to create an XSA.
